20101203040713.857|20101203040715.286|CCO|WAR?

20101203040716.714|20101203040718.143|CCO|YES, IN FACT IT WAS, AND FAR 
20101203040718.143|20101203040719.571|CCO|FROM BEING A BAD TIME TO 
20101203040719.571|20101203040721.000|CCO|IMPLEMENT CHANGE IT WAS, IN HIS 
20101203040721.000|20101203040723.500|CCO|VIEW, IDEAL.
20101203040723.500|20101203040726.000|CCO|>> WE HAVE CHANGED DRAMATICALLY 
20101203040726.000|20101203040728.500|CCO|AS A MILITARY SINCE 2001.
